body.name: LK [2+2 Pack for Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra Screen Protector [Not Glass], 2 Pack Glass Camera Lens Screen with Easy Installation Tool [Fingerprint Compatible], 3D Full Coverage for S22 Ultra
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 32 mins
features: 【Perfect Fit & Newest Materials] LK screen protector and lens protector designed for Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra. New Materials technology, perfect solution to the shortcomings of other products on the market.

【3D Full Coverage& Self-Healing】Exclusive materials production, no moving no warping, edge perfect fit. With scratch resistance, scratch repair ability [Note: minor scratches will disappear within 24-48 hours]

【No Trouble Installation】 The S22 Ultra positioning tool makes the whole installation process a breeze! The alignment problem is easy to tackle! [Note: Please watch the installation tutorial video before installing.]

【HD & Smooth Touch】This S22 Ultra screen protector is made of TPU material, 98% high transparency and ultra-thin design, brings bright and colorful image quality, high-response Haptic Touch Technology supports Fingerprint Unlock, achieve 0.1s unlock.

【9H Lens Protector】 LK 9H Tempered Glass lens protector safeguards the S22 Ultra lens perfectly. Besides, it does not affect the zoom-in function at all, so the ultra-wide lens can focus to capture the smallest details normally & keep the original high resolution of pictures and videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great screen protector!!!
reviews.reviewText: First off, I've never had a screen protector that fits the curved edges of my Galaxy S22 Ultra correctly. This one does! It also doesn't have a hole in it for fingerprint recognition, but it still reads my fingerprint with zero problems. It's flexible, not hard plastic, or glass, and if you watch their installation video first, it's very easy to apply. (Video link is on the box.)I will buy this protector for every phone I have for the rest of my life. I can't say enough good things about it! (If I HAD to say something negative, it does show fingerprints after typing and swiping, but they come off easily with a soft cloth.) 10 stars!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and clear!!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and looks so clear better than before. It also stays clean no fingerprints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Idiot-proof. Great system.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great design. Included is an ingenius guide that plugs into the charging port that lines up the protector for you. Its virtualy impossible to instal off-center. You get a couple alcohol wipes, microfiber cleaning cloth, sticky "dust removers" for any potentially lingering debris, two screen protectors, and even a couple protectors for the rear camera. The headache of putting on a new protector is gone. This was easy. Nice protector to boot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This applied easily, and bubbles disappeared within a day, or two. No problem using phone after cover was applied. My only complaint is that the cover shows every touch. Every. Single. Touch. You have to wipe it down constantly. My old cover did not have this problem, and I find it highly annoying. Would not buy it again due to that issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to protect but slight problem with the covers.
reviews.reviewText: Everything was great and easy to install.I did think the protector was going to be slightly thicker, but it works.The instructions are clear, and they also give you a link to their tutorial which is easy to follow.My only problem was with the lenses protectors. They work fine but they don't fit with the cases. Just keep that in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Easy and it works!
reviews.reviewText: I bought a tempered glass one before purchasing this. That was my first mistake. Spent $40 for a Screen Protector that was very difficult to install. I threw it in the trash after several attempts. I had used LK before and decided to come back where I belong. It does the job, easy to install and works even with the round edge of the Samsung s22 ultra. The camera protector is also nice, doesn't hinder quality at all. One of the screen savers was bent but since there are 2, it was ok. Maybe they will send me a new one. Regardless, I still gave it a 5. I will never stray again! LK forever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work well with many cases
reviews.reviewText: The screen protector is fine and has a nice feel to when scrolling unlike some of the thinner flexible type ones. Unfortunately it doesn't work well with my cases. The edges get caught and lifted by the case. Going to have to switch back to the thin sticker type ones unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I always struggle with putting screen protectors on my phone. Either dust gets underneath, or I have bubbles I can't get rid of. This screen protector left me with neither! The directions in the video are so clear and it was so easy to do. Highly recommend this product!
